   20: -module(ms_transform_SUITE).
   21: -author('pan@erix.ericsson.se').
   22: 
   23: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   24: 
   25: -export([all/0, suite/0,groups/0,init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1, 
   26: 	 init_per_testcase/2, end_per_testcase/2,
   27: 	 init_per_group/2,end_per_group/2]).
   28: -export([basic_ets/1]).
   29: -export([basic_dbg/1]).
   30: -export([from_shell/1]).
   31: -export([records/1]).
   32: -export([record_index/1]).
   33: -export([map_pattern/1]).
   34: -export([map_expr_in_head/1]).
   35: -export([map_pattern_from_shell/1]).
   36: -export([map_expr_in_head_from_shell/1]).
   37: -export([map_exprs/1]).
   38: -export([map_exprs_from_shell/1]).
   39: -export([top_match/1]).
   40: -export([multipass/1]).
   41: -export([old_guards/1]).
   42: -export([autoimported/1]).
   43: -export([semicolon/1]).
   44: -export([bitsyntax/1]).
   45: -export([binary_bifs/1]).
   46: -export([record_defaults/1]).
   47: -export([andalso_orelse/1]).
   48: -export([float_1_function/1]).
   49: -export([action_function/1]).
   50: -export([warnings/1]).
   51: -export([no_warnings/1]).
   52: -export([eep37/1]).
   53: -export([otp_14454/1]).
   54: -export([otp_16824/1]).
   55: -export([unused_record/1]).
   56: 
   57: init_per_testcase(_Func, Config) ->
   58:     Config.
   59: 
   60: end_per_testcase(_Func, _Config) ->
   61:     ok.
   62: 
   63: suite() ->
   64:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   65:      {timetrap,{minutes,6}}].
   66: 
   67: all() -> 
   68:     [from_shell, basic_ets, basic_dbg, records,
   69:      record_index, multipass, bitsyntax, binary_bifs, record_defaults,
   70:      andalso_orelse, float_1_function, action_function,
   71:      warnings, no_warnings, top_match, old_guards, autoimported,
   72:      semicolon, eep37, otp_14454, otp_16824, unused_record,
   73:      map_pattern, map_expr_in_head,
   74:      map_pattern_from_shell, map_expr_in_head_from_shell,
   75:      map_exprs, map_exprs_from_shell].
   76: 
   77: groups() -> 
   78:     [].
   79: 
   80: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   81:     Config.
   82: 
   83: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   84:     ok.
   85: 
   86: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   87:     Config.
   88: 
   89: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   90:     Config.
   91: 
   92: 
   93: %% This may be subject to change
   94: -define(WARN_NUMBER_SHADOW,50).
   95: 
   96: %% Check that shadowed variables in fun head generate warning.
   97: warnings(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   98:     setup(Config),
   99:     Prog = <<"A=5, "
  100: 	     "ets:fun2ms(fun({A,B}) "
  101: 	     "            when is_integer(A) and (A+5 > B) -> "
  102: 	     "              A andalso B "
  103: 	     "            end)">>,
  104:     [{_,[{{1,22},ms_transform,{?WARN_NUMBER_SHADOW,'A'}}]}] =
  105: 	compile_ww(Prog),
  106:     [{_,[{1,ms_transform,{50,'A'}}]}] =
  107:         compile_ww(<<>>,Prog,[{error_location,line}]),
  108:     Prog2 = <<"C = 5,
  109:                ets:fun2ms(fun ({A,B} =
  110: 				   C) when is_integer(A) and (A+5 > B) ->
  111:                                   {A andalso B,C}
  112:                           end)">>,
  113:     [{_,[{{3,8},ms_transform,{?WARN_NUMBER_SHADOW,'C'}}]}] =
  114: 	      compile_ww(Prog2),
  115: 	      Rec3 = <<"-record(a,{a,b,c,d=foppa}).">>,
  116: 	      Prog3 = <<"A = 3,
  117:                C = 5,
  118: 			ets:fun2ms(fun (C
  119: 					= #a{a = A, b = B})
  120: 					 when is_integer(A) and (A+5 > B) ->
  121: 					   {A andalso B,C}
  122: 				   end)">>,
  123:     [{_,[{{3,20},ms_transform,{?WARN_NUMBER_SHADOW,'C'}},
  124:          {{4,15},ms_transform,{?WARN_NUMBER_SHADOW,'A'}}]}] =
  125: 			compile_ww(Rec3,Prog3),
  126: 			Rec4 = <<"-record(a,{a,b,c,d=foppa}).">>,
  127: 			Prog4 = <<"A=3,C=5, "
  128: 				  "F = fun(B) -> B*3 end,"
  129: 				  "erlang:display(F(A)),"
  130: 				  "ets:fun2ms(fun(#a{a = A, b = B} = C) "
  131: 				  "            when is_integer(A) and (A+5 > B) -> "
  132: 				  "              {A andalso B,C} "
  133: 				  "            end)">>,
  134: 			[{_,[{_,ms_transform,{?WARN_NUMBER_SHADOW,'A'}},
  135: 			     {_,ms_transform,{?WARN_NUMBER_SHADOW,'C'}}]}] =
  136: 			compile_ww(Rec4,Prog4),
  137: 			Rec5 = <<"-record(a,{a,b,c,d=foppa}).">>,
  138: 			Prog5 = <<"A=3,C=5, "
  139: 				  "F = fun(B) -> B*3 end,"
  140: 				  "erlang:display(F(A)),"
  141: 				  "B = ets:fun2ms(fun(#a{a = A, b = B} = C) "
  142: 				  "            when is_integer(A) and (A+5 > B) -> "
  143: 				  "              {A andalso B,C} "
  144: 				  "            end)">>,
  145: 			[{_,[{_,ms_transform,{?WARN_NUMBER_SHADOW,'A'}},
  146: 			     {_,ms_transform,{?WARN_NUMBER_SHADOW,'C'}}]}] =
  147: 			compile_ww(Rec5,Prog5),
  148: 			Prog6 = <<"   X=bar, "
  149: 				  "    A = case X of"
  150: 				  "       foo ->"
  151: 				  "          foo;"
  152: 				  "       Y ->"
  153: 				  "          ets:fun2ms(fun(Y) ->" % This is a warning
  154: 				  "                         3*Y"
  155: 				  "                     end)"
  156: 				  "   end,"
  157: 				  "   ets:fun2ms(fun(Y) ->" % Y out of "scope" here, so no warning
  158: 				  "                  {3*Y,A}"
  159: 				  "              end)">>,
  160: 			[{_,[{_,ms_transform,{?WARN_NUMBER_SHADOW,'Y'}}]}] =
  161: 			compile_ww(Prog6),
  162: 			Prog7 = <<"   X=bar, "
  163: 				  "    A = case X of"
  164: 				  "       foo ->"
  165: 				  "          Y = foo;"
  166: 				  "       Y ->"
  167: 				  "          bar"
  168: 				  "   end,"
  169: 				  "   ets:fun2ms(fun(Y) ->" % Y exported from case and safe, so warn
  170: 				  "                  {3*Y,A}"
  171: 				  "              end)">>,
  172: 			[{_,[{_,ms_transform,{?WARN_NUMBER_SHADOW,'Y'}}]}] =
  173: 			compile_ww(Prog7),
  174: 			ok.
  175: 
  176: %% Check that variables bound in other function clauses don't generate
  177: %% warning.
  178: no_warnings(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  179:     setup(Config),
  180:     Prog = <<"tmp(X) when X > 100 ->\n",
  181: 	     "   Y=X,\n"
  182: 	     "   Y;\n"
  183: 	     "tmp(X) ->\n"
  184: 	     "   ets:fun2ms(fun(Y) ->\n"
  185: 	     "                  {X, 3*Y}\n"
  186: 	     "              end)">>,
  187:     [] = compile_no_ww(Prog),
  188: 
  189:     Prog2 = <<"tmp(X) when X > 100 ->\n",
  190: 	      "   Y=X,\n"
  191: 	      "   Y;\n"
  192: 	      "tmp(X) when X < 200 ->\n"
  193: 	      "   ok;\n"
  194: 	      "tmp(X) ->\n"
  195: 	      "   ets:fun2ms(fun(Y) ->\n"
  196: 	      "                  {X, 3*Y}\n"
  197: 	      "              end)">>,
  198:     [] = compile_no_ww(Prog2),
  199:     ok.
  200: 
  201: %% Test that andalso and orelse are allowed in guards.
  202: andalso_orelse(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  203:     setup(Config),
  204:     [{{'$1','$2'},
  205:       [{'and',{is_integer,'$1'},{'>',{'+','$1',5},'$2'}}],
  206:       [{'andalso','$1','$2'}]}] =
  207: 	compile_and_run(<<"ets:fun2ms(fun({A,B}) "
  208: 			  "            when is_integer(A) and (A+5 > B) -> "
  209: 			  "              A andalso B "
  210: 			  "            end)">>),
  211:     [{{'$1','$2'},
  212:       [{'or',{is_atom,'$1'},{'>',{'+','$1',5},'$2'}}],
  213:       [{'orelse','$1','$2'}]}] =
  214: 	compile_and_run(<<"ets:fun2ms(fun({A,B}) "
  215: 			  "            when is_atom(A) or (A+5 > B) -> "
  216: 			  "              A orelse B "
  217: 			  "            end)">>),
  218:     [{{'$1','$2'},
  219:       [{'andalso',{is_integer,'$1'},{'>',{'+','$1',5},'$2'}}],
  220:       ['$1']}] =
  221:         compile_and_run(
  222: 	  <<"ets:fun2ms(fun({A,B}) when is_integer(A) andalso (A+5 > B) ->"
  223: 	    "			 A "
  224: 	    "		 end)">>),
  225:     [{{'$1','$2'},
  226:       [{'orelse',{is_atom,'$1'},{'>',{'+','$1',5},'$2'}}],
  227:       ['$1']}] =
  228:         compile_and_run(
  229: 	  <<"ets:fun2ms(fun({A,B}) when is_atom(A) orelse (A+5 > B) -> "
  230: 	    "			 A "
  231: 	    "		 end)">>),
  232:     ok.
  233: 
  234: 
  235: %% Test that bitsyntax works and does not work where appropriate.
  236: bitsyntax(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  237:     setup(Config),
  238:     [{'_',[],
  239:       [<<0,27,0,27>>]}] =
  240: 	compile_and_run(<<"A = 27, "
  241: 			  "ets:fun2ms(fun(_) -> <<A:16,27:16>> end)">>),
  242:     [{{<<15,47>>,
  243:        '$1',
  244:        '$2'},
  245:       [{'=:=','$1',
  246: 	<<0,27>>},
  247:        {'=:=','$2',
  248: 	<<27,28,19>>}],
  249:       [<<188,0,13>>]}] =
  250: 	compile_and_run(<<"A = 27, "
  251: 			  "ets:fun2ms("
  252:                           "  fun({<<15,47>>,B,C}) "
  253: 			  "  when B =:= <<A:16>>, C =:= <<27,28,19>> -> "
  254: 			  "    <<A:4,12:4,13:16>> "
  255: 			  "  end)">>),
  256:     expect_failure(
  257:       <<>>,
  258:       <<"ets:fun2ms(fun({<<15,47>>,B,C}) "
  259: 	"            when B =:= <<16>>, C =:= <<27,28,19>> -> "
  260: 	"              <<B:4,12:4,13:16>> "
  261: 	"            end)">>),
  262:     expect_failure(
  263:       <<>>,
  264:       <<"ets:fun2ms(fun({<<A:15,47>>,B,C}) "
  265: 	"            when B =:= <<16>>, C =:= <<27,28,19>> -> "
  266: 	"              <<B:4,12:4,13:16>> "
  267: 	"            end)">>),
  268:     ok.
  269: 
  270: 
  271: %% Test that binary BIFs byte_size/1, binary_part/2, binary_part/3 are accepted
  272: binary_bifs(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  273:     setup(Config),
  274:     TestSet = [{<<"hello">>, <<"world">>}, {<<"souldn't">>, <<"match">>}],
  275:     RunMS = fun(MS) -> ets:match_spec_run(TestSet, ets:match_spec_compile(MS)) end,
  276:     % check byte_size/1
  277:     MS1 = compile_and_run(<<"ets:fun2ms(fun({A, B}) when byte_size(A) == 5 -> {A, byte_size(B)} end)">>),
  278:     [{{'$1','$2'},
  279:       [{'==',{byte_size,'$1'},5}],
  280:       [{{'$1',{byte_size,'$2'}}}]}] = MS1,
  281:     [{<<"hello">>, 5}] = RunMS(MS1),
  282:     % check binary_part/2
  283:     MS2 = compile_and_run(<<"ets:fun2ms(fun({A, B}) when binary_part(A, {1, 2}) == <<\"el\">> -> binary_part(B, {2, 3}) end)">>),
  284:     [{{'$1','$2'},
  285:       [{'==',{binary_part,'$1',{{1,2}}},<<"el">>}],
  286:       [{binary_part,'$2',{{2,3}}}]}] = MS2,
  287:     [<<"rld">>] = RunMS(MS2),
  288:     % check binary_part/3
  289:     MS3 = compile_and_run(<<"ets:fun2ms(fun({A, B}) when binary_part(A, 1, 2) == <<\"el\">> -> binary_part(B, 2, 3) end)">>),
  290:     [{{'$1','$2'},
  291:       [{'==',{binary_part,'$1',1,2},<<"el">>}],
  292:       [{binary_part,'$2',2,3}]}] = MS3,
  293:     [<<"rld">>] = RunMS(MS3),
  294:     ok.
  295: 
  296: %% Test that record defaults works.
  297: record_defaults(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  298:     setup(Config),
  299:     [{{<<27>>,{a,5,'$1',hej,hej}},
  300:       [],
  301:       [{{a,hej,{'*','$1',2},flurp,flurp}}]}] =
  302: 	compile_and_run(<<"-record(a,{a,b,c,d=foppa}).">>,
  303: 			<<"ets:fun2ms(fun({<<27>>,#a{a=5, b=B,_=hej}}) -> "
  304: 			  "#a{a=hej,b=B*2,_=flurp} "
  305: 			  "end)">>),
  306:     ok.
  307: 
  308: %% Test basic ets:fun2ms.
  309: basic_ets(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  310:     setup(Config),
  311:     [{{a,b},[],[true]}] = compile_and_run(
  312: 			    <<"ets:fun2ms(fun({a,b}) -> true end)">>),
  313:     [{{'$1',foo},[{is_list,'$1'}],[{{{hd,'$1'},'$_'}}]},
  314:      {{'$1','$1'},[{is_tuple,'$1'}],[{{{element,1,'$1'},'$*'}}]}] =
  315: 	compile_and_run(<<"ets:fun2ms(fun({X,foo}) when is_list(X) -> ",
  316: 			  "{hd(X),object()};",
  317: 			  "({X,X}) when is_tuple(X) ->",
  318: 			  "{element(1,X),bindings()}",
  319: 			  "end)">>),
  320:     [{{'$1','$2'},[],[{{'$2','$1'}}]}] =
  321: 	compile_and_run(<<"ets:fun2ms(fun({A,B}) -> {B,A} end)">>),
  322:     [{{'$1','$2'},[],[['$2','$1']]}] =
  323: 	compile_and_run(<<"ets:fun2ms(fun({A,B}) -> [B,A] end)">>),
  324:     [{{"foo" ++ '_','$1'},[],['$1']}] =
  325:         compile_and_run(<<"ets:fun2ms(fun({\"foo\" ++ _, X}) -> X end)">>),
  326:     ok.
  327: 
  328: %% Tests basic dbg:fun2ms.
  329: basic_dbg(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  330:     setup(Config),
  331:     [{[a,b],[],[{message,banan},{return_trace}]}] =
  332: 	compile_and_run(<<"dbg:fun2ms(fun([a,b]) -> message(banan), ",
  333: 			  "return_trace() end)">>),
  334:     [{['$1','$2'],[],[{{'$2','$1'}}]}] =
  335: 	compile_and_run(<<"dbg:fun2ms(fun([A,B]) -> {B,A} end)">>),
  336:     [{['$1','$2'],[],[['$2','$1']]}] =
  337: 	compile_and_run(<<"dbg:fun2ms(fun([A,B]) -> [B,A] end)">>),
  338:     [{['$1','$2'],[],['$*']}] =
  339: 	compile_and_run(<<"dbg:fun2ms(fun([A,B]) -> bindings() end)">>),
  340:     [{['$1','$2'],[],['$_']}] =
  341: 	compile_and_run(<<"dbg:fun2ms(fun([A,B]) -> object() end)">>),
  342:     [{[],[],[{return_trace}]}] =
  343: 	compile_and_run(<<"dbg:fun2ms(fun([]) -> return_trace() end)">>),
  344:     ok.
  345: 
  346: %% Test calling of ets/dbg:fun2ms from the shell.
  347: from_shell(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  348:     setup(Config),
  349:     Fun = do_eval("fun({a,b}) -> true end"),
  350:     [{{a,b},[],[true]}] = apply(ets,fun2ms,[Fun]),
  351:     [{{a,b},[],[true]}] = do_eval("ets:fun2ms(fun({a,b}) -> true end)"),
  352:     Fun2 = do_eval("fun([a,b]) -> message(banan), return_trace() end"),
  353:     [{[a,b],[],[{message,banan},{return_trace}]}]
  354: 	= apply(dbg,fun2ms,[Fun2]),
  355:     [{[a,b],[],[{message,banan},{return_trace}]}] =
  356: 	do_eval(
  357: 	  "dbg:fun2ms(fun([a,b]) -> message(banan), return_trace() end)"),
  358:     [{{"foo" ++ '_','$1'},[],['$1']}] =
  359:         do_eval("ets:fun2ms(fun({\"foo\" ++ _, X}) -> X end)"),
  360:     ok.
  361: 
  362: %% Tests expansion of records in fun2ms.
  363: records(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  364:     setup(Config),
  365:     RD = <<"-record(t, {"
  366: 	   "t1 = [] :: list(),"
  367: 	   "t2 = foo :: atom(),"
  368: 	   "t3,"
  369: 	   "t4"
  370: 	   "}).">>,
  371:     [{{t,'$1','$2',foo,'_'},[{is_list,'$1'}],[{{{hd,'$1'},'$_'}}]},
  372:      {{t,'_','_','_','_'},[{'==',{element,2,'$_'},nisse}],[{{'$*'}}]}] =
  373: 	compile_and_run(RD,<<
  374: 			     "ets:fun2ms(fun(#t{t1 = X, t2 = Y, t3 = foo}) when is_list(X) ->
  375:  		       {hd(X),object()}; 
  376: 			     (#t{}) when (object())#t.t1 == nisse ->
  377: 				   {bindings()}
  378: 			   end)">>),
  379:     [{{t,'$1','$2','_',foo},
  380:       [{'==',{element,4,'$_'},7},{is_list,'$1'}],
  381:       [{{{hd,'$1'},'$_'}}]},
  382:      {'$1',[{is_record,'$1',t,5}],
  383:       [{{{element,2,'$1'},
  384: 	 {{t,'$1',foo,undefined,undefined}},
  385: 	 {{t,{element,2,'$1'},{element,3,'$1'},{element,4,'$1'},boooo}}}}]}] =
  386: 	compile_and_run(RD,<<
  387:     "ets:fun2ms(fun(#t{t1 = X, t2 = Y, t4 = foo}) when 
  388: 			 (object())#t.t3==7,is_list(X) -> 
  389:  		       {hd(X),object()}; 
  390:  		  (A) when is_record(A,t) -> 
  391:  		       {A#t.t1
  392: 			,#t{t1=A}
  393: 			,A#t{t4=boooo}
  394: 		       }  
  395:  	       end)"
  396: 			>>),
  397:     [{[{t,'$1','$2',foo,'_'}],[{is_list,'$1'}],[{{{hd,'$1'},'$_'}}]},
  398:      {[{t,'_','_','_','_'}],[{'==',{element,2,{hd,'$_'}},nisse}],[{{'$*'}}]}]=
  399: 	compile_and_run(RD,<<
  400:     "dbg:fun2ms(fun([#t{t1 = X, t2 = Y, t3 = foo}]) when is_list(X) -> 
  401:  		       {hd(X),object()}; 
  402:  		  ([#t{}]) when (hd(object()))#t.t1 == nisse -> 
  403:  		       {bindings()}  
  404:  	       end)"
  405: 			>>),
  406:     ok.
  407: 
  408: 
  409: %% Test expansion of records in fun2ms, part 2.
  410: record_index(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  411:     setup(Config),
  412:     RD = <<"-record(a,{a,b}).">>,
  413:     [{{2},[],[true]}] = compile_and_run(RD,
  414: 			  <<"ets:fun2ms(fun({#a.a}) -> true end)">>),
  415:     [{{2},[],[2]}] = compile_and_run(RD,
  416: 			  <<"ets:fun2ms(fun({#a.a}) -> #a.a end)">>),
  417:     [{{2,'$1'},[{'>','$1',2}],[2]}] = compile_and_run(RD,
  418: 		    <<"ets:fun2ms(fun({#a.a,A}) when A > #a.a -> #a.a end)">>),
  419:     ok.
  420: 
  421: map_pattern(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  422:     setup(Config),
  423:     MS = [{{key, #{foo => '$1'}},[],['$1']}],
  424:     MS = compile_and_run(<<"ets:fun2ms(fun({key, #{foo := V}}) -> V end)">>),
  425:     ok.
  426: 
  427: map_expr_in_head(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  428:     setup(Config),
  429:     MS = [{{key, #{foo => '$1'}},[],['$1']}],
  430:     %% Accidentally it is possible to use => instead of := in the fun head,
  431:     %% in compiled code.
  432:     %% Although this is not an intended behaviour it is kept to
  433:     %% maintain backwards compatibility.
  434:     MS = compile_and_run(<<"ets:fun2ms(fun({key, #{foo => V}}) -> V end)">>),
  435:     ok.
  436: 
  437: map_pattern_from_shell(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  438:     MS = [{{key, #{foo => '$1'}},[],['$1']}],
  439:     MS = do_eval("ets:fun2ms(fun({key, #{foo := V}}) -> V end)"),
  440:     ok.
  441: 
  442: map_expr_in_head_from_shell(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  443:     setup(Config),
  444:     MS = [{{key, #{foo => '$1'}},[],['$1']}],
  445:     %% Accidentally it is possible to use => instead of := in the fun head,
  446:     %% in compiled code. This behaviour is kept for backwards compatibility.
  447: 
  448:     %% As a side-effect, it is also possible to do the same with
  449:     %% `transform_from_shell/3', if the AST of the shell fun is
  450:     %% created bypassing the linter. (The linter would prevent
  451:     %% constructing such invalid syntax, so normally this is not
  452:     %% possible in the Erlang shell)
  453:     MS = do_eval("ets:fun2ms(fun({key, #{foo => V}}) -> V end)"),
  454:     ok.
  455: 
  456: map_exprs(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  457:     setup(Config),
  458:     MSGuard = [{{key,'$1','$2'}, [{'=:=','$1',#{foo => '$2'}}], ['$1']}],
  459:     MSGuard = compile_and_run(
  460:                 <<"ets:fun2ms(fun({key, V1, V2}) when V1 =:= #{foo => V2} -> V1 end)">>),
  461:     MSBody = [{{key,'$1'}, [], [#{foo => '$1'}]}],
  462:     MSBody = compile_and_run(
  463:                 <<"ets:fun2ms(fun({key, V}) -> #{foo => V} end)">>),
  464:     ok.
  465: 
  466: map_exprs_from_shell(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  467:     setup(Config),
  468:     MSGuard = [{{key,'$1','$2'}, [{'=:=','$1',#{foo => '$2'}}], ['$1']}],
  469:     MSGuard = do_eval("ets:fun2ms(fun({key, V1, V2}) when V1 =:= #{foo => V2} -> V1 end)"),
  470:     MSBody = [{{key,'$1'}, [], [#{foo => '$1'}]}],
  471:     MSBody = do_eval("ets:fun2ms(fun({key, V}) -> #{foo => V} end)"),
  472:     ok.
  473: 
  474: %% Tests matching on top level in head to give alias for object().
  475: top_match(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  476:     setup(Config),
  477:     RD = <<"-record(a,{a,b}).">>,
  478:     [{{a,3,'_'},[],['$_']}] =
  479: 	compile_and_run(RD,
  480: 			<<"ets:fun2ms(fun(A = #a{a=3}) -> A end)">>),
  481:     [{{a,3,'_'},[],['$_']}] =
  482: 	compile_and_run(RD,
  483: 			<<"ets:fun2ms(fun(#a{a=3} = A) -> A end)">>),
  484:     [{[a,b],[],['$_']}] =
  485: 	compile_and_run(RD,
  486: 			<<"dbg:fun2ms(fun(A = [a,b]) -> A end)">>),
  487:     [{[a,b],[],['$_']}] =
  488: 	compile_and_run(RD,
  489: 			<<"dbg:fun2ms(fun([a,b] = A) -> A end)">>),
  490:     expect_failure(RD,
  491: 			 <<"ets:fun2ms(fun({a,A = {_,b}}) -> A end)">>),
  492:     expect_failure(RD,
  493: 			 <<"dbg:fun2ms(fun([a,A = {_,b}]) -> A end)">>),
  494:     expect_failure(RD,
  495: 			 <<"ets:fun2ms(fun(A#a{a = 2}) -> A end)">>),
  496:     ok.
  497: 
  498: %% Tests that multi-defined fields in records give errors.
  499: multipass(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  500:     setup(Config),
  501:     RD = <<"-record(a,{a,b}).">>,
  502:     expect_failure(RD,<<"ets:fun2ms(fun(A) -> #a{a=2,a=3} end)">>),
  503:     expect_failure(RD,<<"ets:fun2ms(fun(A) -> A#a{a=2,a=3} end)">>),
  504:     expect_failure(RD,<<"ets:fun2ms(fun(A) when A =:= #a{a=2,a=3} ->",
  505: 			 " true end)">>), 
  506:     expect_failure(RD,<<"ets:fun2ms(fun({A,B})when A =:= B#a{a=2,a=3}->",
  507: 			 "true end)">>),
  508:     expect_failure(RD,<<"ets:fun2ms(fun(#a{a=3,a=3}) -> true end)">>),
  509:     compile_and_run(RD,<<"ets:fun2ms(fun(A) -> #a{a=2,b=3} end)">>),
  510:     compile_and_run(RD,<<"ets:fun2ms(fun(A) -> A#a{a=2,b=3} end)">>),
  511:     compile_and_run(RD,<<"ets:fun2ms(fun(A) when A =:= #a{a=2,b=3} ->",
  512: 			 " true end)">>), 
  513:     compile_and_run(RD,<<"ets:fun2ms(fun({A,B})when A=:= B#a{a=2,b=3}->",
  514: 			 "true end)">>),
  515:     compile_and_run(RD,<<"ets:fun2ms(fun(#a{a=3,b=3}) -> true end)">>),
  516:     ok.
  517: 
  518: 
  519: %% Test that old type tests in guards are translated.
  520: old_guards(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  521:     setup(Config),
  522:     Tests = [
  523: 	     {atom,is_atom},
  524: 	     {float,is_float},
  525: 	     {integer,is_integer},
  526: 	     {list,is_list},
  527: 	     {number,is_number},
  528: 	     {pid,is_pid},
  529: 	     {port,is_port},
  530: 	     {reference,is_reference},
  531: 	     {tuple,is_tuple},
  532: 	     {binary,is_binary},
  533: 	     {function,is_function}],
  534:     lists:foreach(
  535: 	    fun({Old,New}) ->
  536: 		    Bin = list_to_binary([<<"ets:fun2ms(fun(X) when ">>,
  537: 					  atom_to_list(Old),
  538: 					  <<"(X)  -> true end)">>]),
  539: 		    case compile_and_run(Bin) of
  540: 			[{'$1',[{New,'$1'}],[true]}] -> 
  541: 			    ok;
  542: 			_ ->
  543: 			    exit({bad_result_for, binary_to_list(Bin)})
  544: 		    end
  545: 	    end,
  546: 	    Tests),
  547:     RD = <<"-record(a,{a,b}).">>,
  548:     [{'$1',[{is_record,'$1',a,3}],[true]}] =
  549: 	compile_and_run(RD,
  550: 			<<"ets:fun2ms(fun(X) when record(X,a) -> true end)">>),
  551:     expect_failure
  552: 	    (RD,
  553: 	     <<"ets:fun2ms(fun(X) when integer(X) and constant(X) -> "
  554: 	      "true end)">>),
  555:     [{'$1',[{is_integer,'$1'},
  556: 		  {is_float,'$1'},
  557: 		  {is_atom,'$1'},
  558: 		  {is_list,'$1'},
  559: 		  {is_number,'$1'},
  560: 		  {is_pid,'$1'},
  561: 		  {is_port,'$1'},
  562: 		  {is_reference,'$1'},
  563: 		  {is_tuple,'$1'},
  564: 		  {is_binary,'$1'},
  565: 		  {is_record,'$1',a,3}],
  566: 	    [true]}] =
  567: 	compile_and_run(RD, <<
  568: 			     "ets:fun2ms(fun(X) when integer(X),"
  569: 			     "float(X), atom(X),"
  570: 			     "list(X), number(X), pid(X),"
  571: 			     "port(X), reference(X), tuple(X),"
  572: 			     "binary(X), record(X,a) -> true end)"
  573: 			     >>),
  574:     ok.
  575:     
  576: %% Test use of autoimported BIFs used like erlang:'+'(A,B) in guards
  577: %% and body.
  578: autoimported(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  579:     setup(Config),
  580:     Allowed = [
  581: 	       {abs,1},
  582: 	       {element,2},
  583: 	       {hd,1},
  584: 	       {length,1},
  585:                {max,2},
  586:                {min,2},
  587: 	       {node,0},
  588: 	       {node,1},
  589: 	       {round,1},
  590: 	       {size,1},
  591: 	       {tl,1},
  592: 	       {trunc,1},
  593: 	       {self,0},
  594:                %%{float,1}, see float_1_function/1
  595: 	       {is_atom,1},
  596: 	       {is_float,1},
  597: 	       {is_integer,1},
  598: 	       {is_list,1},
  599: 	       {is_number,1},
  600: 	       {is_pid,1},
  601: 	       {is_port,1},
  602: 	       {is_reference,1},
  603: 	       {is_tuple,1},
  604: 	       {is_binary,1},
  605: 	       {is_function,1},
  606: 	       {is_record,2,magic},
  607: 	       {'and',2,infix},
  608: 	       {'or',2,infix},
  609: 	       {'xor',2,infix},
  610: 	       {'not',1},
  611: 	       %%{'andalso',2,infix},
  612: 	       %%{'orelse',2,infix},
  613: 	       {'+',1},
  614: 	       {'+',2,infix},
  615: 	       {'-',1},
  616: 	       {'-',2,infix},
  617: 	       {'*',2,infix},
  618: 	       {'/',2,infix},
  619: 	       {'div',2,infix},
  620: 	       {'rem',2,infix},
  621: 	       {'band',2,infix},
  622: 	       {'bor',2,infix},
  623: 	       {'bxor',2,infix},
  624: 	       {'bnot',1},
  625: 	       {'bsl',2,infix},
  626: 	       {'bsr',2,infix},
  627: 	       {'>',2,infix},
  628: 	       {'>=',2,infix},
  629: 	       {'<',2,infix},
  630: 	       {'=<',2,infix},
  631: 	       {'==',2,infix},
  632: 	       {'=:=',2,infix},
  633: 	       {'/=',2,infix},
  634: 	       {'=/=',2,infix}],
  635:     RD = <<"-record(a,{a,b}).">>,
  636:     lists:foreach(
  637: 	    fun({A,0}) ->
  638: 		    L = atom_to_list(A),
  639: 		    Bin1 = list_to_binary(
  640: 			     [
  641: 			      <<"ets:fun2ms(fun(X) when ">>,
  642: 			      L,<<"() -> ">>,
  643: 			      L,<<"() end)">>
  644: 			     ]),
  645: 		    Bin2 = list_to_binary(
  646: 			     [
  647: 			      <<"ets:fun2ms(fun(X) when erlang:'">>,
  648: 			      L,<<"'() -> erlang:'">>,
  649: 			      L,<<"'() end)">>
  650: 			     ]),
  651: 		    Res1 = compile_and_run(Bin1),
  652: 		    Res2 = compile_and_run(Bin2),
  653: 		    case Res1 =:= Res2 of
  654: 			true ->
  655: 			    ok;
  656: 			false ->
  657: 			    exit({not_equal,{Res1,Res2,A}})
  658: 		    end;
  659: 	    ({A,1}) ->
  660: 		    L = atom_to_list(A),
  661: 		    Bin1 = list_to_binary(
  662: 			     [
  663: 			      <<"ets:fun2ms(fun(X) when ">>,
  664: 			      L,<<"(X) -> ">>,
  665: 			      L,<<"(X) end)">>
  666: 			     ]),
  667: 		    Bin2 = list_to_binary(
  668: 			     [
  669: 			      <<"ets:fun2ms(fun(X) when erlang:'">>,
  670: 			      L,<<"'(X) -> erlang:'">>,
  671: 			      L,<<"'(X) end)">>
  672: 			     ]),
  673: 		    Res1 = compile_and_run(Bin1),
  674: 		    Res2 = compile_and_run(Bin2),
  675: 		    case Res1 =:= Res2 of
  676: 			true ->
  677: 			    ok;
  678: 			false ->
  679: 			    exit({not_equal,{Res1,Res2,A}})
  680: 		    end;
  681: 	    ({A,2}) ->
  682: 		    L = atom_to_list(A),
  683: 		    Bin1 = list_to_binary(
  684: 			     [
  685: 			      <<"ets:fun2ms(fun({X,Y}) when ">>,
  686: 			      L,<<"(X,Y) -> ">>,
  687: 			      L,<<"(X,Y) end)">>
  688: 			     ]),
  689: 		    Bin2 = list_to_binary(
  690: 			     [
  691: 			      <<"ets:fun2ms(fun({X,Y}) when erlang:'">>,
  692: 			      L,<<"'(X,Y) -> erlang:'">>,
  693: 			      L,<<"'(X,Y) end)">>
  694: 			     ]),
  695: 		    Res1 = compile_and_run(Bin1),
  696: 		    Res2 = compile_and_run(Bin2),
  697: 		    case Res1 =:= Res2 of
  698: 			true ->
  699: 			    ok;
  700: 			false ->
  701: 			    exit({not_equal,{Res1,Res2,A}})
  702: 		    end;
  703: 	    ({A,2,infix}) ->
  704: 		    L = atom_to_list(A),
  705: 		    Bin1 = list_to_binary(
  706: 			     [
  707: 			      <<"ets:fun2ms(fun({X,Y}) when X ">>,
  708: 			      L,<<" Y -> X ">>,
  709: 			      L,<<" Y end)">>
  710: 			     ]),
  711: 		    Bin2 = list_to_binary(
  712: 			     [
  713: 			      <<"ets:fun2ms(fun({X,Y}) when erlang:'">>,
  714: 			      L,<<"'(X,Y) -> erlang:'">>,
  715: 			      L,<<"'(X,Y) end)">>
  716: 			     ]),
  717: 		    Res1 = compile_and_run(Bin1),
  718: 		    Res2 = compile_and_run(Bin2),
  719: 		    case Res1 =:= Res2 of
  720: 			true ->
  721: 			    ok;
  722: 			false ->
  723: 			    exit({not_equal,{Res1,Res2,A}})
  724: 		    end;
  725: 	    ({A,2,magic}) -> %is_record
  726: 		    L = atom_to_list(A),
  727: 		    Bin1 = list_to_binary(
  728: 			     [
  729: 			      <<"ets:fun2ms(fun(X) when ">>,
  730: 			      L,<<"(X,a) -> ">>,
  731: 			      L,<<"(X,a) end)">>
  732: 			     ]),
  733: 		    Bin2 = list_to_binary(
  734: 			     [
  735: 			      <<"ets:fun2ms(fun(X) when erlang:'">>,
  736: 			      L,<<"'(X,a) -> erlang:'">>,
  737: 			      L,<<"'(X,a) end)">>
  738: 			     ]),
  739: 		    Res1 = compile_and_run(RD,Bin1),
  740: 		    Res2 = compile_and_run(RD,Bin2),
  741: 		    case Res1 =:= Res2 of
  742: 			true ->
  743: 			    ok;
  744: 			false ->
  745: 			    exit({not_equal,{Res1,Res2,A}})
  746: 		    end
  747: 	    end,
  748: 	    Allowed),
  749:     ok.
  750: 
  751: %% Test semicolon in guards of match_specs.
  752: semicolon(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  753:     setup(Config),
  754:     Res01 = compile_and_run
  755: 		   (<<"ets:fun2ms(fun(X) when is_integer(X); "
  756: 		     "is_float(X) -> true end)">>),
  757:     Res02 = compile_and_run
  758: 		   (<<"ets:fun2ms(fun(X) when is_integer(X) -> true; "
  759: 		     "(X) when is_float(X) -> true end)">>),
  760:     Res01 = Res02,
  761:     Res11 = compile_and_run
  762: 		   (<<"ets:fun2ms(fun(X) when is_integer(X); "
  763: 		     "is_float(X); atom(X) -> true end)">>),
  764:     Res12 = compile_and_run
  765: 		   (<<"ets:fun2ms(fun(X) when is_integer(X) -> true; "
  766: 		     "(X) when is_float(X) -> true; "
  767: 		     "(X) when is_atom(X) -> true end)">>),
  768:     Res11 = Res12,
  769:     ok.
  770:     
  771:     
  772: %% OTP-5297. The function float/1.
  773: float_1_function(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  774:     setup(Config),
  775:     RunMS = fun(L, MS) -> 
  776:                     ets:match_spec_run(L, ets:match_spec_compile(MS)) 
  777:             end,
  778:     MS1 = compile_and_run
  779:                   (<<"ets:fun2ms(fun(X) -> float(X) end)">>),
  780:     [F1] = RunMS([3], MS1),
  781:     true = is_float(F1) and (F1 == 3),
  782:                   
  783:     MS1b = compile_and_run
  784:                   (<<"dbg:fun2ms(fun(X) -> float(X) end)">>),
  785:     [F2] = RunMS([3], MS1b),
  786:     true = is_float(F2) and (F2 == 3),
  787:                   
  788:     MS2 = compile_and_run
  789:             (<<"ets:fun2ms(fun(X) when is_pid(X) or float(X) -> true end)">>),
  790:     [] = RunMS([3.0], MS2),
  791: 
  792:     MS3 = compile_and_run
  793:             (<<"dbg:fun2ms(fun(X) when is_pid(X); float(X) -> true end)">>),
  794:     [true] = RunMS([3.0], MS3),
  795: 
  796:     MS4 = compile_and_run
  797:             (<<"ets:fun2ms(fun(X) when erlang:float(X) > 1 -> big;"
  798:                "              (_) -> small end)">>),
  799:     [small,big] = RunMS([1.0, 3.0], MS4),
  800: 
  801:     MS5 = compile_and_run
  802:             (<<"ets:fun2ms(fun(X) when float(X) > 1 -> big;"
  803:                "              (_) -> small end)">>),
  804:     [small,big] = RunMS([1.0, 3.0], MS5),
  805: 
  806:     %% This is the test from autoimported/1.
  807:     [{'$1',[{is_float,'$1'}],[{float,'$1'}]}] =
  808:         compile_and_run
  809:             (<<"ets:fun2ms(fun(X) when float(X) -> float(X) end)">>),
  810:     [{'$1',[{float,'$1'}],[{float,'$1'}]}] =
  811:         compile_and_run
  812:            (<<"ets:fun2ms(fun(X) when erlang:'float'(X) -> "
  813:               "erlang:'float'(X) end)">>),
  814:     ok.
  815: 
  816: 
  817: %% Test all 'action functions'.
  818: action_function(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  819:     setup(Config),
  820:     [{['$1','$2'],[],
  821: 	    [{set_seq_token,label,0},
  822: 	     {get_seq_token},
  823: 	     {message,'$1'},
  824: 	     {return_trace},
  825: 	     {exception_trace}]}] =
  826: 	compile_and_run
  827: 	  (<<"dbg:fun2ms(fun([X,Y]) -> "
  828: 	    "set_seq_token(label, 0), "
  829: 	    "get_seq_token(), "
  830: 	    "message(X), "
  831: 	    "return_trace(), "
  832: 	    "exception_trace() end)">>),
  833:     [{['$1','$2'],[],
  834: 	    [{process_dump},
  835: 	     {enable_trace,send},
  836: 	     {enable_trace,'$2',send},
  837: 	     {disable_trace,procs},
  838: 	     {disable_trace,'$2',procs}]}] =
  839: 	compile_and_run
  840: 	  (<<"dbg:fun2ms(fun([X,Y]) -> "
  841: 	    "process_dump(), "
  842: 	    "enable_trace(send), "
  843: 	    "enable_trace(Y, send), "
  844: 	    "disable_trace(procs), "
  845: 	    "disable_trace(Y, procs) end)">>),
  846:     [{['$1','$2'],
  847: 	    [],
  848: 	    [{display,'$1'},
  849: 	     {caller},
  850: 	     {set_tcw,{const,16}},
  851: 	     {silent,true},
  852: 	     {trace,[send],[procs]},
  853: 	     {trace,'$2',[procs],[send]}]}] =
  854: 	compile_and_run
  855: 	  (<<"A = 16, dbg:fun2ms(fun([X,Y]) -> "
  856: 	    "display(X), "
  857: 	    "caller(), "
  858: 	    "set_tcw(A), "
  859: 	    "silent(true), "
  860: 	    "trace([send], [procs]), "
  861: 	    "trace(Y, [procs], [send])  end)">>),
  862:     [{['$1','$2'],
  863:              [],
  864:              [{caller_line},
  865:               {current_stacktrace},
  866:               {current_stacktrace,3}]}] =
  867:         compile_and_run
  868:           (<<"dbg:fun2ms(fun([X,Y]) -> "
  869:              "caller_line(),"
  870:              "current_stacktrace(),"
  871:              "current_stacktrace(3) end)">>),
  872:     ok.
  873: 
  874: 
  875: eep37(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  876:     setup(Config),
  877:     [{'$1',[],['$1']}] =
  878:         compile_and_run(<<"F = fun _Ms() ->\n"
  879:                           "            ets:fun2ms(fun (X) -> X end)\n"
  880:                           "    end,\n"
  881:                           "F()">>).
  882: 
  883: 
  884: otp_14454(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  885:     setup(Config),
  886:     [{'$1',[],[{'band','$1',136}]}] =
  887:         compile_and_run(
  888:           <<"ets:fun2ms(fun(A) -> A band ( -(-17) bsl 3) end)">>),
  889:     [{'$1',[],[{'band','$1',136}]}] =
  890:         compile_and_run(
  891:           <<"ets:fun2ms(fun(A) -> A band ( erlang:'bsl'(-(-17), 3)) end)">>),
  892:     ok.
  893: 
  894: 
  895: otp_16824(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  896:     setup(Config),
  897:     Prog = <<
  898:       "-module(tmp).\n",
  899:       "-include_lib(\"stdlib/include/ms_transform.hrl\").\n",
  900:       "-export([tmp/1]).\n\n",
  901:       "tmp(_) -> ets:fun2ms(fun(<<>>) -> 1 end).\n">>,
  902:     FN = temp_name(),
  903:     ok = file:write_file(FN, Prog),
  904:     {ok, Forms} = parse_file(FN),
  905:     {error,[{_, [{{5,25},ms_transform,_}]}], []} =
  906:         compile:forms(Forms, [return]),
  907:     ok.
  908: 
  909: %% OTP-17186.
  910: unused_record(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  911:     setup(Config),
  912:     Record = <<"-record(r, {f}).\n\n">>,
  913:     Expr = <<"ets:fun2ms(fun(#r{}) -> e end)">>,
  914:     [] = compile_ww(Record, Expr),
  915:     ok.
  916: 
  917: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  918: %% Helpers
  919: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  920: 
  921: setup(Config) ->
  922:     put(mts_config,Config),
  923:     put(mts_tf_counter,0).
  924: 
  925: temp_name() ->
  926:     Conf = get(mts_config),
  927:     C = get(mts_tf_counter),
  928:     put(mts_tf_counter,C+1),
  929:     filename:join([proplists:get_value(priv_dir,Conf),
  930: 		   "tempfile"++integer_to_list(C)++".tmp"]).
  931: 
  932: 
  933: expect_failure(Recs,Code) ->
  934:     case (catch compile_and_run(Recs,Code)) of
  935: 	      {'EXIT',_Foo} ->
  936: 		  ok;
  937: 	      Other ->
  938: 		  exit({expected,failure,got,Other})
  939: 	  end.
  940:  
  941: compile_and_run(Expr) ->
  942:     compile_and_run(<<>>,Expr).
  943: compile_and_run(Records,Expr) ->
  944:     Prog = <<
  945: 	"-module(tmp).\n",
  946:     "-include_lib(\"stdlib/include/ms_transform.hrl\").\n",
  947:     "-export([tmp/0]).\n",
  948:     Records/binary,"\n",
  949:     "tmp() ->\n",
  950:     Expr/binary,".\n">>,
  951:     FN=temp_name(),
  952:     file:write_file(FN,Prog),
  953:     {ok,Forms} = parse_file(FN),
  954:     {ok,tmp,Bin} = compile:forms(Forms),
  955:     code:load_binary(tmp,FN,Bin),
  956:     tmp:tmp().
  957: 
  958: compile_ww(Expr) ->
  959:     compile_ww(<<>>,Expr).
  960: 
  961: compile_ww(Records,Expr) ->
  962:     compile_ww(Records,Expr,[]).
  963: 
  964: compile_ww(Records,Expr, Opts) ->
  965:     Prog = <<
  966: 	"-module(tmp).\n",
  967:     "-include_lib(\"stdlib/include/ms_transform.hrl\").\n",
  968:     "-export([tmp/0]).\n",
  969:     Records/binary,"\n",
  970:     "-file(?FILE, 0). ",
  971:     "tmp() ->\n",
  972:     Expr/binary,".\n">>,
  973:     FN=temp_name(),
  974:     file:write_file(FN,Prog),
  975:     {ok,Forms} = parse_file(FN),
  976:     {ok,tmp,_Bin,Wlist} = compile:forms(Forms,[return_warnings,
  977: 					       nowarn_unused_vars | Opts]),
  978:     Wlist.
  979: 
  980: compile_no_ww(Expr) ->
  981:     Prog = <<
  982: 	"-module(tmp).\n",
  983:     "-include_lib(\"stdlib/include/ms_transform.hrl\").\n",
  984:     "-export([tmp/1]).\n\n",
  985:     Expr/binary,".\n">>,
  986:     FN=temp_name(),
  987:     file:write_file(FN,Prog),
  988:     {ok,Forms} = parse_file(FN),
  989:     {ok,tmp,_Bin,Wlist} = compile:forms(Forms,[return_warnings,
  990: 					       nowarn_unused_vars]),
  991:     Wlist.
  992: 
  993: parse_file(FN) ->
  994:     epp:parse_file(FN, [{location, {1,1}}]).
  995: 
  996: do_eval(String) ->
  997:     {done,{ok,T,_},[]} = erl_scan:tokens(
  998: 			   [],
  999: 			   String++".\n",1),
 1000:     {ok,Tree} = erl_parse:parse_exprs(T),
 1001:     {value,Res,[]} =  erl_eval:exprs(Tree,[],none,none),
 1002:     Res.
